1: 1 Long, clever, clean, light, brave, silly, poor, fat, deep, wide, merry, hot

1 Long (longer, the longest), clever (cleverer, the cleverest), clean (cleaner, the cleanest), light (lighter, the lightest), brave (braver, the bravest), silly (sillier, the silliest), poor (poorer, the poorest), fat (fatter, the fattest), wide (wider, the widest), merry (merrier, the merriest), hot (hotter, the hottest).
